subScenes.name: 开场问候
subScenes.description: 面试官友好开场，建立沟通氛围

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, thanks for coming in today. I'm Dr. Reynolds, chair of the scholarship committee.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，谢谢您今天来，我是奖学金委员会主席雷诺兹博士。

responses.text: Nice to meet you, Dr. Reynolds. I'm Alex Chen, and I really appreciate this opportunity.
responses.text_cn: 很高兴认识您，雷诺兹博士，我是陈Alex，非常感谢这个机会。

responses.text: Hey Dr. Reynolds, thanks for having me! I've been looking forward to this.
responses.text_cn: 嘿，雷诺兹博士，谢谢您接待我！我等这一天很久了。

responses.text: Thank you. I'm Alex.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，我是Alex。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌但自然的方式自我介绍，展现自信。

qaPairs.speakerText: How's your day going so far? Any trouble finding the building?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 今天过得怎么样？找楼费劲吗？

responses.text: It's been great, thanks! The campus is beautiful, and I followed the signs perfectly.
responses.text_cn: 非常好，谢谢！校园很美，我完全按指示找到了。

responses.text: Pretty good! A little lost at first, but a student helped me out.
responses.text_cn: 还行！一开始迷路了，但有学生帮了我。

responses.text: Fine, no problems.
responses.text_cn: 还行，没麻烦。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气回应，避免过度抱怨或夸张。

subScenes.name: 学术成就提问
subScenes.description: 面试官深入询问学术表现与研究能力

qaPairs.speakerText: I saw you published a paper in the Journal of Environmental Science. Can you tell me what your main contribution was?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我看到你在《环境科学期刊》发表过论文，能说说你的主要贡献吗？

responses.text: Sure! I developed a new model to predict microplastic accumulation in rivers, which improved accuracy by 22% compared to existing methods.
responses.text_cn: 当然！我开发了一个新模型，能更准确预测河流中微塑料的积累，比现有方法提升22%。

responses.text: I helped analyze data and wrote part of the paper—wasn't the lead, but I learned a ton.
responses.text_cn: 我帮忙分析数据并写了部分内容，不是第一作者，但学到了很多。

responses.text: It was about river pollution. I did the stats.
responses.text_cn: 是关于河流污染的，我负责统计。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用数据支撑成就，避免空泛描述。

qaPairs.speakerText: What was the biggest challenge you faced during your research, and how'd you overcome it?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 研究中你遇到的最大挑战是什么？怎么解决的？

responses.text: The equipment kept failing, so I reached out to three other labs and borrowed their tools—turned out to be a great collaboration.
responses.text_cn: 设备老出故障，我就联系了三个实验室借设备，结果成了很好的合作。

responses.text: It was tough—I didn’t know how to fix it at first, but I watched YouTube tutorials and asked my prof.
responses.text_cn: 挺难的，一开始不会修，后来看了YouTube教程，问了教授。

responses.text: Hard. I just kept trying.
responses.text_cn: 很难，我就一直试。

qaPairs.usageNote: 展示解决问题的能力，强调行动与成长。

subScenes.name: 领导力与团队经历
subScenes.description: 考察你在团队中的影响力与协作能力

qaPairs.speakerText: You led a student volunteer group—what made you decide to step up, and how'd you keep everyone motivated?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你领导过学生志愿团队，是什么让你决定担起责任？怎么让大家保持动力？

responses.text: I noticed people were overwhelmed, so I created a rotation schedule and celebrated small wins—turns out, snacks helped a lot!
responses.text_cn: 我看大家压力太大，就排了轮值表，还庆祝小成就，结果零食特别管用！

responses.text: Someone had to do it, and I liked organizing stuff. I just reminded them why we were doing it.
responses.text_cn: 总得有人做，我喜欢组织。我就提醒他们为什么要做。

responses.text: I stepped in. We had pizza once a week.
responses.text_cn: 我接手了，每周吃一次披萨。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体策略+人性化细节展现领导力。

qaPairs.speakerText: Tell me about a time you disagreed with your team. How'd you handle it?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 说说你和团队有分歧的时候，你是怎么处理的？

responses.text: We argued over the project timeline—I presented data showing our original plan was unrealistic, then proposed a phased approach. They agreed.
responses.text_cn: 我们对时间表有分歧，我用数据说明原计划不现实，提议分阶段推进，他们接受了。

responses.text: I was like, 'This won't work,' but instead of arguing, I asked, 'What if we try this?' and it actually worked.
responses.text_cn: 我说这行不通，但没硬刚，而是问'要不试试这个？' 结果真成了。

responses.text: I didn't like it, but I went along.
responses.text_cn: 我不认同，但还是跟着做了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 展现沟通技巧，避免‘我赢你输’的表达。

subScenes.name: 未来规划与动机
subScenes.description: 追问职业目标与奖学金的关联性

qaPairs.speakerText: Why this scholarship? What’s your plan after graduation?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 为什么选这个奖学金？毕业后你有什么计划？

responses.text: This scholarship supports global sustainability leaders—and I'm aiming to work with the UN on water policy. The network here is unmatched.
responses.text_cn: 这个奖学金支持全球可持续发展领袖，我想为联合国做水资源政策，这里的资源无人能比。

responses.text: I need financial help to focus on my thesis, and after that, I'm heading back home to start a nonprofit.
responses.text_cn: 我需要经济支持专心写论文，之后回老家创办非营利组织。

responses.text: I need money. Then I'll get a job.
responses.text_cn: 我需要钱，然后找工作。

qaPairs.usageNote: 将奖学金与清晰的长期目标绑定，体现责任感。

qaPairs.speakerText: How will you give back to the community once you've benefited from this opportunity?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你受益后，打算如何回馈社会？

responses.text: I'm planning to mentor first-gen students from my country who want to study abroad—paid workshops, not just advice.
responses.text_cn: 我想为家乡的首代留学生提供付费辅导，不只是建议。

responses.text: I'll share what I learn online—free videos, blogs, stuff like that.
responses.text_cn: 我会在网上免费分享所学，做视频、写博客。

responses.text: I'll try to help.
responses.text_cn: 我会尽量帮忙。

qaPairs.usageNote: 具体化回馈方式，避免空泛承诺。

subScenes.name: 结束致谢
subScenes.description: 面试收尾，礼貌道别并表达感谢

qaPairs.speakerText: We'll be in touch within two weeks. Thanks again for your time and passion today.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 两周内我们会通知你。再次感谢你今天的时间与热忱。

responses.text: Thank you so much for this chance—I'm truly honored and excited to hear back!
responses.text_cn: 非常感谢这个机会，我深感荣幸，期待回复！

responses.text: Really appreciate it! Hope to hear good news soon.
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了！希望早日收到好消息。

responses.text: Thanks. Bye.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，再见。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢时加入情感词，留下积极印象。

qaPairs.speakerText: Is there anything you'd like to add before we wrap up?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 在结束前，你还有什么想补充的吗？

responses.text: Actually, yes—I recently won a local innovation award that wasn't on my resume. I'd love to share the details if you're interested.
responses.text_cn: 其实有，我刚拿了本地创新奖，简历上没写，如果您感兴趣我可以补充。

responses.text: Nope, I think I covered it.
responses.text_cn: 没了，我觉得都说全了。

responses.text: Nope.
responses.text_cn: 没了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 可趁机补充亮点，但避免冗长重复。
